name: reinjury
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of causing physical harm again to a person or animal who has had an injury: She wore a brace on her knee to prevent reinjury. The doctor said that I would have to stop work because of the risk of re-injury. She feared that playing in the tournament might cause a re-injury. Related words
injure
reinjure
